name: Hamburg Flutter and Beyond 2021/01
description:
hello_flutter_people.dart
one of our new year's resolutions is to do more (remote) meetups, so here we are: We are more than happy to announce our first meetup in 2021!

##########
Live Stream: Will be posted a few days prior the event
##########

Agenda:

18:00
----------
Live Stream starts

18:05
----------
Talk #0 (Special):
Agenda, organizer group addition & intro to our new website for "Hamburg Flutter and Beyond"!

18:15
----------
Talk #1: Developing Mobile Apps On A Roller Coaster

In this talk, Grisha would like to share his journey of how it feels like to switch from Android to Flutter project and then back to Android development. Along the way, he will share his thoughts about both mobile development models and many other topics. It's been one hell of a ride!

presented_by_grigori_hlopkov.dart (Consultant from Netlight)

18:40
----------
Talk #2: How To Build A Modern Website With Flutter

As it will be announced and going live on the meetup date itself, we want to explore a bit how the new homepage for "Flutter Meetup and Beyond" was built entirely in Flutter. How ready is the browser support really? What were pitfalls? You will find out!

presented_by_renÃ©_schramowski.dart (CTO of ePrivacy)
presented_by_eric_wohlgethan.dart (Consultant from Netlight)

19:05
----------
SHORT BREAK

19:10
----------
Talk #3: Flutter vs. Android Jetpack Compose

Let's talk about the similarities and differences between Flutter and Compose. When using the same application architecture, the differences between the two and the external components used together in their respective fields.

presented_by_chris_xinyue_zhao.dart (MOIA)

19:35
----------
Talk #4: OPEN SLOT

Do you want to give a talk? We have one more slot open for this event. Contact us if you are interested!

20:00
----------
"Ask us anything"
You do have some Flutter related questions? Just send a message into the Live Stream and we try our best to answer these.

We are looking forward to having you!

name: Hamburg Flutter and Beyond 2020/11
description:
+++++
Since we postponed our "Hamburg Flutter and Beyond 2020/10" meetup due to technical issues this is the alternative meetup.
+++++

hello_flutter.dart
We hope you are doing well these days.

We would like to introduce you to our second meetup, organized with our friends from Netlight. This meetup will be a remote one and you guys can watch it from anywhere you like.

##########
Live Stream: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R4P4NtmEl6E
##########

Agenda:

18:00
----------
Live Stream starts

18:05
----------
Talk #1: Navigator.of(context).pushNamed(â€˜How to Navigateâ€™);

â€‹As developers we need to think about how we enable users to access different parts of the application. Usually we want to separate topics / content in general across different views. Luckily we can rely on good practices on how to achieve this by implementing something like a Navbar, Drawer, Tabbar etc. Flutter offers various ways on how to navigate so we need to decide how to do it properly. We will take a look on common problems, possible solutions and some good practices to keep navigation even in larger projects maintainable.

presented_by_renÃ©_schramowski.dart (CTO of ePrivacy)

18:30
----------
Talk #2: Introduction to Riverpod - Provider, but different

â€‹The new project from Providers developer Remi Rousselet! Learn about what makes this package special and what sets it apart from the original Provider pattern. We will look into some use-cases and comparisons. Disclaimer: This - as the whole event - should also be friendly for an entry level Flutter developer or developers of other frameworks and therefore it will be a superficial introduction and not a deep, scientific talk. ðŸ˜‰

presented_by_patrick_rÃ¼schenbaum.dart (Consultant from Netlight)

18:55
----------
Break

19:05
----------
Talk #3: Service oriented architecture implemented with flutter

Enable your teams to work independently

presented_by_bogdan_melnychuk.dart (claimsforce)

19:30
----------
Talk #4: Flutter with Tensorflow Lite for Face-mask detecting

presented_by_chris_xinyue_zhao.dart (MOIA)

19:55
----------
"Ask us anything"
You do have some flutter related questions? Just send a message into the Live Stream and we try our best to answer these.

We are looking forward to having you!

name: Flutter Demo Session - Kickoff for the community
description:
As a kick off to a hopefully bright and awesome future of Flutter in Hamburg we want to do a Flutter Demo get together where members of the community can demo their created Flutter apps.

The goal is to show the variety of use cases, best practices and awesome findings.

Everyone who wants to present a demo will have 3 minutes to demo his app and will have time to answer questions from the audience.

In the end of the event we want to exchange about future deep dive topics we could cover in upcoming events.

claimsforce will be happy to host this event and to provide you with drinks and snacks for an evening full of inspiration, exchange and learnings.

Please let us know upfront if you want to attend as a presenter.

Looking forward to an amazing start for this community.
